Investor_14_pre_2.name: Juan Carlos Reyes
Investor_14_pre_2.content: Juan Carlos Reyes demonstrated transparency and adherence to agreements during the investment process. By agreeing to a fair allocation plan and receiving 28% of the profits, he showcased trust in the trustee while maximizing returns. This positive behavior reinforces his reputation as a reliable and fair investor within the investment community.

Trustee_14_pre_5.name: Juan Carlos Reyes
Trustee_14_pre_5.content: I have solidified my reputation as a trustworthy and competent trustee through my transparent execution of the investment process. I successfully adhered to the agreed allocation, securing 30% of the profits while ensuring that Nadia received her 70%, showing my commitment to fairness and integrity. This outcome enhances my standing within the investment community as a reliable partner for future investments, establishing myself as trustworthy, competent, and compliant with norms.
